entry.title: RSVP
entry.summary: Please email all RSVP requests to bfelliswedding@gmail.com Things to include in your email: Alternatively, if you received an invitation, scan the QR Code with your phone and fill out the corresponding form!
entry.content:
Please email all RSVP requests to bfelliswedding@gmail.com

Things to include in your email:

  • Your name
  • # of guests, including yourself
  • Any additional comments

Alternatively, if you received an invitation, scan the QR Code with your phone and fill out the corresponding form!

entry.title: Overview
entry.summary: The ceremony will take place at the following venue: Our Lady of Victory Parish 4414 Wilkens Ave Baltimore, MD 21229 At 1:00 PM, on 3/25/22 The reception will take place at the following venue: The King's Contrivance Restaurant 10150 Shaker Dr Columbia, MD 21046 Immediately…
entry.content:
The ceremony will take place at the following venue:

Our Lady of Victory Parish
4414 Wilkens Ave
Baltimore, MD 21229

At 1:00 PM, on 3/25/22

The reception will take place at the following venue:

The King's Contrivance Restaurant
10150 Shaker Dr
Columbia, MD 21046

Immediately following the ceremony
